text:
@Keir_Starmer So stop making excuses and attack this crooked gov with everything you have!
Promise to:
- stop the Brexit madness
- stop HS2 madness
- import ventilators
- revive the country after Covid-19
- invest in NHS
- cooperate with EU
- invest in housing
What are you waiting for!?
